metadata.title: Lookah
metadata.description: Lookah - Transform your style with artificial intelligence. Create realistic outfits instantly.

hero.title: Transform your style with
hero.subtitle: Create realistic and modern outfits instantly.
hero.description: Upload your photos, select garments and let AI do the rest.

step1.title: Upload your model and garments
step1.description: Upload photos of your models with a neutral background along with the garments you want to try. Our AI automatically detects poses, facial features and clothing, supports multiple formats and processes everything in seconds.

step2.title: Adjust style options
step2.description: Customize every detail: choose from casual, formal or urban styles, define the season, select full body or half body and adjust lighting. You'll have full control over the final result with just a few clicks.

step3.title: Generate professional results
step3.description: In just seconds, get high-quality images ready to use. Download, share with your team or clients and save to your personal gallery. Each result maintains the essence of the model while applying garments realistically and naturally.

pricing.title: Simple and scalable pricing
pricing.subtitle: No extra charges. No hidden fees.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Perfect to get started and try the platform.

professional.title: Professional
professional.description: For online stores and professional catalogs.

footer.description: Transform your style with artificial intelligence. Create realistic and modern outfits in seconds with our AI-powered virtual fitting room.

privacy.title: Privacy Notice
privacy.intro: At Lookah, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This Privacy Notice explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our AI-powered virtual clothing try-on platform.

dataCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services:
items: Account information: name, email, and password when you register
Images: photos of models and garments you upload to our platform
Usage data: information about how you use our services, including image generations
Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and cookies
Payment data: processed securely through external providers

dataUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use the collected information to:
items: Provide and maintain our AI services
Process your image generation requests
Improve our artificial intelligence algorithms
Communicate with you about your account and our services
Manage payments and billing
Detect and prevent fraud or misuse
Comply with our legal obligations

dataSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information only with:
items: Service providers who help us operate the platform
Payment processors to handle transactions
Legal authorities when required by law

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data, including encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal data
Rectify inaccurate information
Request deletion of your data
Object to the processing of your data
Request data portability
Withdraw your consent at any time

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes set out in this notice, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Notice or wish to exercise your rights, contact us at:

terms.title: Legal Terms
terms.intro: Welcome to Lookah. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with these Legal Terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account and using Lookah's services, you agree to be bound by these terms, all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Service Description
services.content: Lookah provides an artificial intelligence platform that allows users to generate images of models wearing different clothing items. Services include:
items: Upload of model and garment images
AI-powered image generation
Download of generated results
Personal gallery storage

userAccount.title: 3. User Account
userAccount.content: To use our services, you must:
items: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
Maintain the security of your password
Immediately notify us of any unauthorized use
Be at least 18 years old or have parental/guardian consent

usage.title: 4. Acceptable Use
items: Upload illegal, offensive content or content that infringes third-party rights
Use images of people without their consent
Generate content for fraudulent or deceptive purposes
Attempt to access or interfere with our systems
Resell or redistribute our services without authorization
Use the platform to create malicious deepfakes or inappropriate content

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: You retain all rights to the images you upload. Images generated by our AI belong to you, but you grant us a license to process them and improve our services. Lookah and its logos are our registered trademarks.

payment.title: 6. Payments and Subscriptions
payment.content: Subscription plans are billed monthly. You can cancel at any time, but no refunds are provided for partial periods. We reserve the right to modify prices with prior notice.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms, without prior notice and without refund. You can also close your account at any time from settings.

disclaimer.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.content: Lookah is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services.

changes.title: 9. Modifications
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on the platform.

law.title: 10. Applicable Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Spain. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Madrid, Spain.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage them on Lookah.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to site owners.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Necessary for the basic functioning of the platform, such as keeping you logged in and remembering your language preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help us understand how users interact with our platform, allowing us to improve the user experience. We use tools like Google Analytics.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: Enable enhanced and personalized functionalities, such as remembering your settings and preferences.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: Used to track visitors across websites and display relevant ads. We work with advertising partners who may set these cookies.

cookiesList.title: 3. Specific Cookies We Use
cookiesList.content: List of cookies used on Lookah:
items: _lookah_session: Essential session cookie (duration: session)
_lookah_lang: Language preference (duration: 1 year)
_ga: Google Analytics (duration: 2 years)
_gid: Google Analytics (duration: 24 hours)
_lookah_auth: Authentication token (duration: 30 days)

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Some of our partners (such as payment processors and analytics providers) may set cookies on your device when you visit Lookah. We do not control these cookies and recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these third parties.

manageCookies.title: 5. How to Manage Cookies
manageCookies.content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways:
items: Browser settings: Most browsers allow you to reject or accept cookies
Delete cookies: You can delete all cookies already stored on your device
Block cookies: You can configure your browser to block cookies from specific sites
Preference panel: Use our cookie preferences center (coming soon)
manageCookies.warning: Please note that if you disable cookies, some parts of our platform may not function properly.

updates.title: 6. Updates to this Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or for operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We recommend reviewing this page periodically.
